title: Leave and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2021 (No. 4 of 2021), other than Parts
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Family Leave and Miscellaneous
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Family Leave and Miscellaneous 

Provisions Act 2021 (Commencement) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited family leave miscellaneous provision act 2021 (commencement) order 2021

title: Leave and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2021 (No. 4 of 2021), other than Parts
heading: 2. The 1st day of April 2021 is appointed as the day on which the Family
text_raw:
2. The 1st day of April 2021 is appointed as the day on which the Family 
Leave and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2021 (No. 4 of 2021), other than Parts 
4 and 9, shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

30 March, 2021. 

RODERIC O’GORMAN, 

Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and 
Youth. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 2nd April, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [148] 3
text_norm: 2 1st day april 2021 appointed day family leave miscellaneous provision act 2021 (no 4 2021) part 4 9 shall come operation given official seal 30 march 2021 roderic gorman minister child equality disability integration youth notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 2nd april 2021 148 3

title: Leave and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2021 (No. 4 of 2021), other than Parts
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The Family Leave and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2021 (Commencement) 
Order 2021 commences all Parts, other than Part 4 and Part 9, of the Family 
Leave and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2021 (No. 4 of 2021) with effect from 
1st April 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [148]
